trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Winston-Salem
There were no other sightings in Winston-Salem on or around November 26th 2009
Summary: Green illuminated circle with illuminated reddish-orange cone shaped "tail"
divs: sighting detailsmy family & had just gotten off of highway 421, and were driving down styers ferry road in the direction of country club\shallowford road. we were just getting back from thanksgiving out of town, and it was around 9pm. i happened to look to the left at the cow pasture & saw a bright green illuminated ball with a reddish-orange illuminated cone shaped "tail". the cone shape was at a diagonal angle off the top right part of the ball, but they did appear to be connected to each other. it looked like it may have been further off from the cow pasture, but not high in the sky - barely over tree level. i pointed it out to my husband and we were only able to look at it for a few seconds as we drove by (maybe 5 seconds). my initial thought was a meteor, until i realized it didn't move at all.
